testcase.name: SC1- User could register with valid data
testcase.system-out: And user clicked on register link...........................................passed When user selected gender...................................................passed And user entered first name.................................................passed And user entered last name..................................................passed And user selected birth of date.............................................passed And user entered email for registration.....................................passed And user entered company name...............................................passed And user entered password for registration..................................passed And user confirmed password for registration................................passed And user clicked on register button.........................................passed Then user should have a success message for registration....................passed

testcase.classname: F01_Login | users could use login functionality to open their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "nourahmed@test.com" and "123456789"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.name: SC3- User could reset his/her password successfully
testcase.system-out: And user clicked on forgot password.........................................passed And user entered email for reset password...................................passed And user clicked on recover button..........................................passed Then user should have a success message for recover.........................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Search | users will be able to search for products with different parameters
testcase.name: user could search for product using fullName
testcase.system-out: When user clicks on search field............................................passed And user search with name of product........................................passed Then user could find relative results.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged User could switch between currencies
testcase.name: SC5- Logged User could switch between currencies US-Euro
testcase.system-out: And user change currency from usd to euro...................................passed Then all products shown are in euro.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.name: SC6- Logged user could select different Categories
testcase.system-out: And user hover on electronic category.......................................passed And user click on cellPhone category........................................passed Then cell phones page should appear to the user.............................passed

testcase.classname: Logged user could filter with color
testcase.name: Logged user could filter with red color
testcase.system-out: And user hover on apparel category..........................................passed And user click on shoes category............................................passed And user change color to red................................................passed Then shoes with red color only should appear to the user....................passed

testcase.classname: SC8- Logged user could select different tags
testcase.name: Logged user could select awesome tag
testcase.system-out: And user open search page...................................................passed And user choose awesome tag.................................................passed Then awesome products page should appear to the user........................passed

testcase.classname: SC9- Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to Shopping cart
testcase.system-out: And user navigate to books pages............................................passed And user add items to shopping cart.........................................passed And user navigate to shopping cart..........................................passed Then added items should appear at shopping cart.............................passed

testcase.classname: SC9- Logged user could add different products to wishlist
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to wishlist
testcase.system-out: And user add items to wishlist..............................................passed And user navigate to wishlist...............................................passed Then added items should appear at wishlist..................................passed

testcase.classname: SC9- Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.name: Logged user could add different products to compare list
testcase.system-out: And user add items to compare list..........................................passed And user navigate to compare list...........................................passed Then added items should appear at compare list..............................passed
